text: In Unity's Visual Effect Graph, what is the purpose of the Spawn Context?

options.text: It determines the visual style of the particles
It generates new particles over time
It is used to animate the particles
It is used to destroy particles

feedbackCorrect: The Spawn Context in Unity's Visual Effect Graph is used to generate new particles over time.
feedbackIncorrect: The Spawn Context in Unity's Visual Effect Graph is not used to determine the visual style of the particles, animate them, or destroy them. Its main purpose is to generate new particles over time.
